headline: Should You Reconsider Old Dominion After a 22% Drop in 2025?
summary: Thinking about what to do with Old Dominion Freight Line stock right now? You are not alone. With logistics and transport names back in the headlines, ODFL has found itself at the center of the action, and investors are weighing their next move. After a bumpy run this year, closing recently at $136.12, the stock is down 22.5% year-to-date and has slipped 30.7% over the past twelve months. The short-term picture has been softer as well, with a 1.4% dip over the last week and 3.5% over the last...
